title: Understanding Story Frameworks
text: Story frameworks provide a structured guide to help individuals organize and present their narratives effectively.

title: Benefits for Those Who Struggle
text: Some individuals find it challenging to put together a coherent narrative. How do frameworks assist them?

title: Flexibility and Adaptation of Frameworks
text: Consider whether frameworks should be rigidly followed or whether there's room for adaptation based on the presenter’s needs.

hintAnswer: For people who struggle to put a narrative together, frameworks can help them structure their ideas.
title: Assessing Framework Benefits
text: Frameworks provide structured guidance that helps individuals lacking a narrative structure organize their ideas. Would this statement fit in your choice?
choices: For people who struggle to put a narrative together, frameworks can help them structure their ideas.
Established frameworks provide a tried and true method that everyone should follow.
Using story frameworks will make every presentation a success.
Every organization should settle on one story framework and use it across the board, for consistency.
